import React, { useState, Fragment } from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import './features24.css' const Features24 = (props) => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState(0) return (
{activeTab === 0 && ( )} {activeTab === 1 && ( )} {activeTab === 2 && ( )}
setActiveTab(0)} className="features24-tab-horizontal1" >
{activeTab === 0 &&
}

{props.feature1Title ?? ( Professional Electrical Services )}

{props.feature1Description ?? ( Our team of experienced electricians provides professional electrical services for residential and commercial properties. )}
setActiveTab(1)} className="features24-tab-horizontal2" >
{activeTab === 1 &&
}

{props.feature2Title ?? ( 24/7 Emergency Response )}

{props.feature2Description ?? ( We offer 24/7 emergency electrical services to address any urgent issues that may arise at any time of the day or night. )}
setActiveTab(2)} className="features24-tab-horizontal3" >
{activeTab === 2 &&
}

{props.feature3Title ?? ( Customized Electrical Solutions )}

{props.feature3Description ?? ( We tailor our electrical solutions to meet the specific needs of each client, ensuring high-quality workmanship and customer satisfaction. )}
) } Features24.defaultProps = { feature1ImgAlt: 'Professional Electrical Services Image', feature3Description: undefined, feature3Title: undefined, feature3ImgSrc: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1605027581722-173d57ce506a?crop=entropy&cs=tinysrgb&fit=max&fm=jpg&ixid=M3w5MTMyMXwwfDF8cmFuZG9tfHx8fHx8fHx8MTc0MTY3NTM0Nnw&ixlib=rb-4.0.3&q=80&w=1080', feature1ImgSrc: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1669170936278-010c9c8eb680?crop=entropy&cs=tinysrgb&fit=max&fm=jpg&ixid=M3w5MTMyMXwwfDF8cmFuZG9tfHx8fHx8fHx8MTc0MTY3NTM0N3w&ixlib=rb-4.0.3&q=80&w=1080', feature2Description: undefined, feature1Title: undefined, feature3ImgAlt: 'Customized Electrical Solutions Image', feature1Description: undefined, feature2ImgSrc: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1581091212991-8891c7d4bd9b?crop=entropy&cs=tinysrgb&fit=max&fm=jpg&ixid=M3w5MTMyMXwwfDF8cmFuZG9tfHx8fHx8fHx8MTc0MTY3NTM0N3w&ixlib=rb-4.0.3&q=80&w=1080', feature2ImgAlt: 'Emergency Response Image', feature2Title: undefined, } Features24.propTypes = { feature1ImgAlt: PropTypes.string, feature3Description: PropTypes.element, feature3Title: PropTypes.element, feature3ImgSrc: PropTypes.string, feature1ImgSrc: PropTypes.string, feature2Description: PropTypes.element, feature1Title: PropTypes.element, feature3ImgAlt: PropTypes.string, feature1Description: PropTypes.element, feature2ImgSrc: PropTypes.string, feature2ImgAlt: PropTypes.string, feature2Title: PropTypes.element, } export default Features24
